item.description:
Learn to take the guesswork out of making perfect digital prints by using cutting edge Spyder products by Datacolor. Datacolor's Education Manager, Josh Fischer, will be on hand to answer questions and talk about a color calibration process that will save you time, paper and money. PLUS, there will be some great door prizes up for grabs, including a Spydercube and five autographed coffee table books featuring the photographic work of Boston's own, Lou Jones (www.fotojones).

To register go to DigitalPhotoAcademy.com, click on Boston and scroll down to register on line. Since this is a free class, put in 00000's when it asks you for a credit card number.

item.name: FREE Spyder Event at E.P Levines
